ygData.subject: Mail Runs and a L50
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Bards, My guild is on new bard watch for me now, and they reported a bard in Halas bank. I did the Qeynos to HighKeep to Freeport runs last night
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Bards,
My guild is on new bard watch for me now, and they reported a bard in Halas
bank. I did the Qeynos to HighKeep to Freeport runs last night and started
back again. I am making a list of names and locations as I go and will post
it as a spoiler maybe when I am reasonably sure it's complete.
Also, Xegony has a L50 bard now. I will try to ask him some of the questions
we talk about, what songs does he use most, what equipemnt does he prefer
etc, when I see that he is somewhere he can talk. He was in gukbottom last
night when I noticed he was 50, not a cozy spot to stop and chat. Is anyone
interested in this enough for me to post his answers?

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Squire Master, Order of the Rose
The Right and Noble Order of Excalibur
